_header: A woman bearing a virginal mouth
_description: John Capgrave, translation of a Latin tag, ‘Virginis hos habitum que gerens mirabile dictu…’ in his Solace of Pilgrimys — three long unrhymed lines

OxfAllS17.Transcription:
A woman bering a virginall mouth and a virginall habite meruele to
                    seyNeyþer of oure kinrede ne of oure blode hathe a bore a
                    childThe late comyng of þis dredfull lorde songe þe former
                    prophetis
OxfAllS17.Editions:
Hingeston,  Francis Charles,
                        ed.  
             Johannis Capgrave liber de illustribus Henricis.
Rolls Series
         7 (1858; repr. Kraus, 1970): 359.
